name: Card Mage (TheArmadylo)
description:
A card-based magic duelling game

Duel other wizards by combining cards to cast spells, or get more powerful cards. Experiment with different card combinations to discover different spells.

Very much a work in progress. This is my very first game, and a lot of work is needed.

Any feedback is much appreciated!

TO DO (in no particular order):

  • Improve animations
  • More arenas
  • New spells
  • Online multiplayer

NOTE: You must unzip the file to play the game.
